sections.heading: The Story Behind the Taj Mahal
paragraphs: The Taj Mahal is India’s most iconic monument, built by Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his beloved wife Mumtaz Mahal.
Its white marble architecture and symmetrical gardens make it one of the world’s most beautiful structures.

sections.heading: Things to Do
list: See the Taj Mahal at sunrise
Explore the marble craftsmanship up close

sections.heading: Travel Tips
paragraphs: Avoid Fridays as the Taj Mahal is closed for prayers. Sunrise visits offer cooler weather and fewer tourists.

sections.heading: Nearby Attractions
paragraphs: Visit Fatehpur Sikri, Itimad-ud-Daulah, and local marble markets around Agra.
